description:
Change of use of room at level thirteen to telecommunication equipment room and installation of two panel antennae on roof and one antenna on flank elevation.  (Observations to the Corporation of London). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  M23260/01A-04A, two unnumbered                         sheets of details of Sharguard SG4                         Permanent Guardrail, one                         specification sheet for ETACS/GSM                         direction antennae.
decision_conditions: The Corporation are advised that this Council considers that the proposal would add to clutter on the roof and would fail to preserve or enhance the appearance of the building and of the adjacent Conservation Area.
